com.sonf.core.session

类 AbstractIOSession<CH,CG extends AbstractIOConfig>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sonf.core.session.AbstractIOSession<CH,CG>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    IOSession<CH,CG>
    直接已知子类:
    NioSession

    public abstract class AbstractIOSession<CH,CG extends AbstractIOConfig>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IOSession<CH,CG>
    Base implementation of IOSession

      • AbstractIOSession

        参数:
        controller - the controller provided service for this session
        processor - the processor handling this session

    • 方法详细资料

      • getId

        public final long getId()
        We use an AtomicLong to guarantee that the session ID are unique.
        指定者:
        getId 在接口中 IOSession<CH,CG extends AbstractIOConfig>
        返回:
        a unique identifier for this session. Every session has its own ID which is different from each other.

      • getController

        指定者:

        参数:

      • updateReadTime

      • notifyIdleSession

        public void notifyIdleSession(long curElapsedTime)
        Fires a SESSION_IDLE if applicable for the specified session.
        参数:
        curElapsedTime - the current elapsed real time (SystemClock.elapsedRealtime()())

      • closeOnFlush

        public final ICloseFuture closeOnFlush()
        Closes this session after all queued write packets are flushed. This operation is asynchronous. Wait for the returned ICloseFuture if you want to wait for the session actually closed.
        指定者:
        closeOnFlush 在接口中 IOSession<CH,CG extends AbstractIOConfig>
        返回:
        The associated ICloseFuture

      • closeNow

        public final ICloseFuture closeNow()
        Closes this session immediately. This operation is asynchronous, it returns a ICloseFuture.
        指定者:
        closeNow 在接口中 IOSession<CH,CG extends AbstractIOConfig>
        返回:
        The ICloseFuture that can be use to wait for the completion of this operation

      • write

        public IWriteFuture write(java.lang.Object message)
        Writes the specified message to remote endpoint. This operation is asynchronous; IOHandler.messageSent(IOSession,Object) will be invoked when the message is actually sent. You can also wait for the returned IWriteFuture if you want to wait for the message actually written.
        指定者:
        write 在接口中 IOSession<CH,CG extends AbstractIOConfig>
        参数:
        message - The message to write. Note that the message of IoBuffer class will be considered as a raw data and sent directly, all IFilter encoders on the session's FilterChain will be ignored.
        返回:
        The associated WriteFuture

      • setScheduledForFlush

        public final boolean setScheduledForFlush(boolean schedule)
        Set the scheduledForFLush flag. As we may have concurrent access to this flag, we compare and set it in one call.
        参数:
        schedule - the new value to set if not already set.
        返回:
        true if the session flag has been set, and if it wasn't set already.

      • isScheduledForFlush

        public final boolean isScheduledForFlush()
        Tells if the session is scheduled for flushed
        返回:
        true if the session is scheduled for flush

      • setRemoteAddress

        public abstract void setRemoteAddress(java.net.SocketAddress remoteAddress)
        Set the remote SocketAddress of the remote endpoint
        参数:
        remoteAddress - SocketAddress

      • setRemoteAddress

        public abstract void setRemoteAddress(java.lang.String remoteHost,
                                      int remotePort)
        Set the host and port of the remote endpoint
        参数:
        remoteHost - host, may be ip address or domain
        remotePort - port the remote server listened on for access

      • getRemoteAddress

        public abstract java.net.SocketAddress getRemoteAddress()
        返回:
        the parsed remote SocketAddress, may be null if un-parsed or parse failed.

      • parseRemoteAddress

        public abstract void parseRemoteAddress()
                                 throws java.net.UnknownHostException
        parse the remote address into the SocketAddress object
        抛出:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - by underlying system call
